fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
In 2017, YEPP adopted a new political agenda "A stronger Europe in a changing world". As Europe is facing crises on every front from migration, Eurosceptism and radicalisation, we strive to be the youth voice for the centre-right on all issues facing Europe. It is our aim to create concrete policies in relation to these issues. 
 
While of course we have a focus on youth issues other major topics for YEPP are: 
-Digital Agenda 
-Single Market 
-Job Creation 
-Trans-Atlantic Relations
organisation_name: Youth of the European People's Party (YEPP)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Act as the European-level umbrella organization of center-right youth organizations.  
 
Act as the youth organization of the European People’s Party and the EPP Group in the European Parliament.  
 
Organise the exchange of information and practices between the member organizations.
